name: Hopeless (MaverickHorn)
description:
Hopeless

After years of burning coal, came the heat. 

The last survivors ride on a train, followed by the deadly light of the sun.

This game was developed for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls

Throw the "coal" dice into appropriate slots to get a boost. If you're too slow, the sunlight will burn your train, so keep the engine running.

The whole game is played by drag and drop.

Make sure to use your special skills to manipulate the dice.

Credits

A game by Susann Goerges & Maverick Horn
